title: RBI Monetary Policy: MPC keeps FY25 inflation forecast unchanged at 4.5%
description: RBI Monetary Policy meeting: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) maintained its 4.5% inflation projection for 2024–2025 with Q2 at 4.1%, Q3 at 4.8% and Q4 at 4.2%. The consumer price index (CPI) inflation for the first quarter of the next financial year 2025-26 is projected at 4.3%. The risks are evenly...
